video.title: Glitter Force
video.synopsis: Five preteen girls learn they're a legendary superhero squad known as the Glitter Force. Their mission? To defend Earth from evil fairytale villains.

episodes.synopsis: When the magical kingdom of Jubiland is invaded by an evil emperor, tiny pixie Candy is sent to Earth to recruit five girls for a superhero team.
episodes.title: An Exciting Beginning

episodes.synopsis: As Candy and Emily try to figure out a way to recruit the rest of the Glitter Force, Kelsey enlists Emily to help her become the next volleyball MVP.
episodes.title: Kelsey Gets a Makeover

episodes.synopsis: When Emily and Kelsey discover that shy and sensitive Lily is a talented artist, they immediately devise a plan to draw her out of her shell.
episodes.title: We Want Peace! Glitter Peace!

episodes.synopsis: After April protects Emily, Kelsey and Lily from bullies, they decide that it's time to invite her to join the Glitter Force.
episodes.title: Here Comes Glitter Spring!

episodes.synopsis: Emily and her friends help Chloe with the student council's read-along at a local elementary school, but the story's happy ending is jeopardized.
episodes.title: Glitter Breeze vs. The Witch

episodes.synopsis: The girls receive a visit from Pop, Candy's older brother, and learn more about what it means to be in the Glitter Force.
episodes.title: The Library of Legends

episodes.synopsis: Constantly interrupted by curious friends and family, the girls search for a perfect hideout where they can conduct official Glitter Force business.
episodes.title: The Perfect Hideout

episodes.synopsis: When one of Brooha's inventions causes Emily and Candy to switch bodies, Candy must pretend to be Emily for a day, wreaking all sorts of havoc.
episodes.title: Glitter Switchers!

episodes.synopsis: Lily plays the perfect prank on Emily for April Fools' Day, but it backfires when Emily tells the entire school before Lily can tell her the truth.
episodes.title: April Fools!

episodes.synopsis: After the girls come in contact with another one of Brooha's inventions, they are shrunk to the size of bugs.
episodes.title: Shrink-a-Rooed!

episodes.synopsis: Candy learns the girls are going on a field trip without her. Rascal gives the fairy tale villains a nose that poses a challenge to the Glitter Force.
episodes.title: Feeling Blue

episodes.synopsis: Emily's luck seems to run out when she gets a bad fortune on the first day of the class field trip to the Asia Pacific Expo.
episodes.title: Emily’s Unlucky Day

episodes.synopsis: Emily, Lily and Candy get separated from the others on the third day of their field trip at the Asia Pacific Expo, leading to an all-day search.
episodes.title: The Lost Girls

episodes.synopsis: When Emily forgets about Mother's Day, she enlists the help of her friends to think of the perfect gift to give to her mother.
episodes.title: Mother’s Day Crunch

episodes.synopsis: Realizing she's never joined a club on her own, Chloe quits all the clubs she's in, including the Glitter Force, in order to find her true passion.
episodes.title: Chloe Quits

episodes.synopsis: When April volunteers her friends to run with her in the school's fitness day relay race, Lily fears her lack of athletic ability will drag them down.
episodes.title: The Great Relay Race

episodes.synopsis: The girls must band together to help Emily and Kelsey get through the school day after they're turned invisible by one of Brooha's inventions.
episodes.title: See-U-No-More

episodes.synopsis: The Glitter Force, Candy and Pop prepare to celebrate the big Star Festival, unaware that Rascal has stepped up his sinister plan against them.
episodes.title: Wish Upon a Star

episodes.synopsis: After one of their own is whisked away from them, the Glitter Force must make the journey to Jubiland in order to save their friend and their own world.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Choice

episodes.synopsis: The Glitter Force must travel to the Shadow Realm to stop Rascal from bringing back the evil Emperor Nogo, while saving Candy in the process.
episodes.title: Into the Shadow Realm!
